content: If you are a crypto currency trader, or investor, you need a bank wallet to secure your profits or investments long term. ¬†What is a bank wallet ?A bank wallet is a wallet that you will never connect to meta-mask or dapp browsers, or any site at all...... A bank wallet is where you keep your long term holdings, profits or gains across blockchain networks ranging from Ethereum network, Fantom, Solana, MATIC, BSC and the rest. As the crypto currency market gets dipper, there would be lots of wallet hackings in the nearest Future, your BANK wallet is your guarantee not to be a Victim, start moving your valuable tokens to your bank wallet now please. If you don't have a bank wallet yet, hurry up and create one as soon as possible. And also remember to keep your private keys safeGod bless you üôèüèΩü§ùüëçüèΩ---------------------------------------------------------------- A bank wallet is still your crypto currency wallet, like wallets from trust, metamask, trezor or ledger etc. I call it a BANK WALLET to illustrate its importance. The bank wallet will be a special wallet you will never use to connect dapp browsers. All you have to do is just send your funds there and keep. EDITED

comments.author: Yogee
comments.body: Bank wallet? The term sounds weird and you're probably the first one to use that one. I thought it's some custodial wallet from the name alone but it's similar to a cold storage like Paper wallets the way you described it. You could also just use hardware wallets for your long-term assets and store them properly in a safe or secure place.
